H0.text: In 1784, who designed the first power loom. Richard Arkwright

H1.text: In 1784, who designed the first power loom. James Watt

H2.text: In 1784, who designed the first power loom. Samuel Slater

H3.text: In 1784, who designed the first power loom. Edmund Cartwright

A4.text: Cartwright designed his first power loom in 1784 and patented it in 1785
